summary: Three jailers, a wheelchaired man and a mentally handicapped girl climb a mountain in the alps along with their supervisors.
cast: Ken Duken|Regula Grauwiller|Gregor Törzs|Max Herbrechter|Frank Giering|Erhan Emre|Alexander Hörbe|Antje Westermann|Gerhard Garbers|Monika Häckermann|Rainer Werner
title: Gran Paradiso
